metadata.default_value: By default, cluster control plane logs aren't sent to CloudWatch Logs. ... When you enable a log type, the logs are sent with a log verbosity level of 2 .  To enable or disable control plane logs with the console. Open the Amazon EKS console at https://console.aws.amazon.com/eks/home#/clusters . Amazon EKS Information in CloudTrail CloudTrail is enabled on your AWS account when you create the account. When activity occurs in Amazon EKS, that activity is recorded in a CloudTrail event along with other AWS service events in Event history.
metadata.name: The default namespace should not be used
metadata.description:
Kubernetes provides a default namespace, where objects are placed if no namespace is specified for them.
Placing objects in this namespace makes application of RBAC and other controls more difficult.
metadata.rationale: Resources in a Kubernetes cluster should be segregated by namespace, to allow for security controls to be applied at that level and to make it easier to manage resources.
metadata.audit:
Run this command to list objects in default namespace

```
kubectl get all -n default
```

The only entries there should be system managed resources such as the `kubernetes` service
metadata.remediation: Ensure that namespaces are created to allow for appropriate segregation of Kubernetes resources and that all new resources are created in a specific namespace.
